thread.title: Hounds’ hopes take hit with loss at Bubblers
thread.title_full: Hounds’ hopes take hit with loss at Bubblers

author: ANDREW MILLER Sports Writer
title: Hounds’ hopes take hit with loss at Bubblers
text:
Hounds’ hopes take hit with loss at Bubblers By ANDREW MILLER Sports Writer ShipNC.com | 0 comments 
The Greyhound boys soccer team’s district playoff hopes were dealt a major blow with a 3-1 loss at Boiling Spring Thursday. 
Currently on the outside looking in in the District 3 playoff picture, the Greyhounds had a tremendous chance to state their case with a win over the 9-3 Bubblers, whom they had already played to a close 2-2 draw earlier this season. Instead the Bubblers, ranked eighth in District 3 AA power rankings, took the game as an opportunity to get revenge for the Sept. 22 result.
